content: हृदयंगम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Heart-stirring, touching, thrilling. {@--2@} Lovely, handsome; <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Sweet, attractive, pleasant, agreeable; अहो हृदयंगमः परिहासः <ls>Māl. 3</ls>; वल्लकी च हृदयंगमस्वना <ls>R. 19. 13</ls>, <ls>Ku. 2. 16.</ls> {@--4@} Fit, appropriate. {@--5@} Dear, beloved, cherished; क्व नु ते हृदयंगमः सखा <ls>Ku. 4. 24.</ls> --मं An appropriate speech.
